acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Import rejects mismatched hashes.
- [ ] JSONL parsing enforces line and shard size limits.
- [ ] Merge output is deterministic for identical inputs.
description:
**Problem**
Phase 6: implement checkpoint import and verification (manifest_hash and content_hash). There is no importer for the new checkpoint layout.

**Context**
- REALTIME_PLAN.md ยง13.9 and ยง13.9.1 (import, verification, JSONL bounds)
**Files:** src/git/checkpoint/import.rs (new), src/git/checkpoint/layout.rs, src/git/checkpoint/mod.rs
design:
**Design**
- Read checkpoint tree or cache, verify manifest hashes and file hashes.
- Validate content_hash from meta preimage.
- Parse JSONL shards line by line with size bounds and merge into StoreState deterministically.
- Return included watermarks and optional included_heads for seeding head sha.
title: Phase 6: Checkpoint import + verification

description:
**Problem**
Phase 7 tests need IPC streaming test client and load generation.

**Context**
- REALTIME_PLAN.md ยง18: admin.status correctness under load
- Blocks Phase 7 testing bead

**Design**
Create test infrastructure:
- IPC streaming test client: subscribe, receive events, verify ordering
- Load generator: concurrent mutations at configurable rate
- admin.status snapshot collector: capture watermarks/segment stats over time
- Consistency checker: verify watermarks are monotonic under load

**Acceptance**
- [ ] tests/fixtures/ipc_stream.rs with StreamingClient
- [ ] tests/fixtures/load_gen.rs with LoadGenerator
- [ ] tests/fixtures/admin_status.rs with StatusCollector
- [ ] cargo test fixtures::ipc_stream passes

**Files:** tests/fixtures/ipc_stream.rs (new), tests/fixtures/load_gen.rs (new), tests/fixtures/admin_status.rs (new)
title: Phase 7 test infrastructure: IPC streaming client + load generator
